name: detailed_food_recipe_by_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool chinese_food_db.
Tool description: Chinese food recipes with high-quality images stored on AWS S3 for fast accessibility. Easy to use!
Category: Food
API description: Fetches a detailed food recipe using the given recipe ID from The Vegan Recipes DB API.

is_id.description: The ID of the food recipe to fetch.
